texto: 3.1.55 software system system for which software is of primary importance to the stakeholders Note 1 to entry: In the most general case, a software system is comprised of hardware, software, people, and manual procedures. Note 2 to entry: In a software system, software is the leading driver in meeting system requirements. 8 © ISO/IEC 2017 – All rights reserved © IEEE 2017 – All rights reserved Authorized licensed use limited to: Burapha University provided by UniNet. ISO/IEC/IEEE 12207:2017(E) 3.1.56 software system element member of a set of elements that constitute a software system Note 1 to entry: A
